WorkItem.Description: Downloaded the 18881 version of Rawr and used it for my hunter alt.

Comments.Message:
The issue was that Don Santos' rifle was not appearing in the list, even though it was on the character, and the dps value of it put it halfway down the list. (Value for dps was given on initial loading of the character.)
Also disappeared from the item cache if I changed to a different ranged weapon. Item cache was updated with upgrades from armory.

May have to do with the proc not being modeled yet.

Adding AP to the weapon included it in the listing. 

Used 75AP as my value, although Cheekys Spreadsheet says that it is worth 109 with my gear at the time. 

Might be worth using an actual calculation for it in Rawr, if you think it is worth the effort, as the value changes with the amount of haste and the shot rotation used.

5% proc chance on each shot, 10 second uptime for 250AP. No cooldown at all as it can overwrite the buff.
